Keywords: Armor , Brute , Horsemen , Monster
Real Name: Dr. Bruce Banner
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Destroy Blocking, Characters
THE SECOND HORSEMAN: WAR: If an opposing character was damaged this turn, modify Hulk's attack +1. If an opposing character was KO'd this turn, modify his attack +2 instead.
RAGE GIVEN PURPOSE, BRUTALITY GIVEN FORM: Charge, Flurry.
LIKE LAMBS TO THE SLAUGHTER: Blades/Claws/Fangs. When Hulk uses it, also deal damage equal to half the d6 result to each untargeted opposing character adjacent to Hulk.
SINGLE-MINDED BRUTALITY: STOP. Invulnerability, Regeneration. SAFEGUARD: opposing Probability Control.

Comments
November 9, 2021
Goop
This line is better but still kinda iffy. As a giant he's easily targeted by any range on the map and is extremely weak against psyblast. Your opponent DOES have to hit him twice to be rid of him and must do so on the same turn since that regen will keep him coming back. He has giant willpower and 4exploit with a probable 11atk which is quite good for 50pts. His keywords are very limited though.
November 2, 2021
Buckwheat
This is a better investment than the alternative point cost, IMO. That Improved Movement is no joke.
